title: [Feature Request] Shift+LClick/Ctrl+LClick, select multiple targets, issue commands
author: BloodyIron
body_snippet:
I would like it if I could select a partial list from my list of servers to do things to. So, instead of having to connect/disconnect from all/one in a folder, shift+LClick, or Ctrl+LClick, so you have a range/partial list of servers, then right click as you normally would (connect/disconnect/etc menu pops up), and then it only does the task based on what is selected/highlighted.

Any chance we could get this, please? :)

iterations.description: The context menu logic currently relies on the singular SelectedNode property, ignoring other selected items during multi-selection.

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: I think this is related to (or maybe duplicates) #945 and #1114 (multi-select support).

notes:
AI triage (gemini): The context menu logic currently relies on the singular SelectedNode property, ignoring other selected items during multi-selection.
Approach: Verify MultiSelect is enabled in ConnectionTree and refactor ConnectionContextMenu to iterate over SelectedObjects to perform actions on all selected connections.
